amendment.description: Amendment provides an additional $38 million for the Special Supplemental Food Program for Women, Infants, and Children (WIC) program.
amendment.purpose: An amendment, printed as amdendment No. 1 (Kapture) in House Rpt. 105-97, to appropriate an additional $38 million in funding for the Special Supplemental Food Program for Women, Infants, and Children. The amendment would recind $38 million in previously funded appropriations for NASA to offset the increased WIC funding.

vote.text: On agreeing to the Obey amendment (A002) Agreed to by recorded vote: 338 - 89 (Roll no. 131).
